abstract: The social network will list its shares under the ticker symbol FB on the Nasdaq, a coup for the exchange embroiled in a fierce battle with the New York Stock Exchange for the darlings of Silicon Valley.
snippet: The social network will list its shares under the ticker symbol FB on the Nasdaq, a coup for the exchange embroiled in a fierce battle with the New York Stock Exchange for the darlings of Silicon Valley.
lead_paragraph: Facebook, which is preparing for its highly anticipated initial public offering, has picked a home.

headline.main: Facebook Is Said to Pick Nasdaq for I.P.O.
